metadata.name: A Priori 001
metadata.description:
A PRIORI 001 ft. Oneil Sandiford

Forms is an ongoing abstract photography project that aims to 
question self-identity through existential portraiture.  
It represents our inner selves through out-of-body experiences. 
An assemblance of our thoughts, beliefs and understandings 
manifested through our exteriors.  It is a deconstruction 
of the centralized self, an admittance of the unintelligible 
and a search for similarities in the paradox.

Each image is made entirely in-camera 
using multiple exposures on a single sheet of 8x10 film.

 No post-processing is used in the creations.  
 As such, the negatives are in their final Forms.

This NFT is a digital drum scan created to accompany its original negative, housed in a custom fabricated lightbox frame for physical display.
